org.openimaj.image.processing.face.detection.keypoints

Class FKEFaceDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.face.detection.keypoints.FKEFaceDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FaceDetector<KEDetectedFace,org.openimaj.image.FImage>, org.openimaj.io.ReadableBinary, org.openimaj.io.ReadWriteableBinary, org.openimaj.io.WriteableBinary

    @Reference(type=Inproceedings,
           author={"Mark Everingham","Josef Sivic","Andrew Zisserman"},
           title="Hello! My name is... Buffy - Automatic naming of characters in TV video",
           year="2006",
           booktitle="In BMVC")
public class FKEFaceDetector
extends Object
implements FaceDetector<KEDetectedFace,org.openimaj.image.FImage>
    F(rontal)K(eypoint)E(nriched)FaceDetector uses an underlying face detector to detect frontal faces in an image, and then looks for facial keypoints within the detections.

    Implementation and data is based on Mark Everingham's Oxford VGG Baseline Face Processing Code

    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Detail

      • FKEFaceDetector

        public FKEFaceDetector()
        Default constructor. Uses the standard HaarCascadeDetector with a minimum search size of 80 pixels.

      • FKEFaceDetector

        public FKEFaceDetector(int size)
        Construct with a standard HaarCascadeDetector and the given minimum search size.
        Parameters:
        size - minimum detection size.

      • FKEFaceDetector

        public FKEFaceDetector(float patchScale)
        Default constructor. Uses the standard HaarCascadeDetector with a minimum search size of 80 pixels, and the given scale-factor for extracting the face patch.
        Parameters:
        patchScale - the scale of the patch compared to the patch extracted by the internal detector.

      • FKEFaceDetector

        public FKEFaceDetector(int size,
               float patchScale)
        Construct with a standard HaarCascadeDetector and the given minimum search size, and the given scale-factor for extracting the face patch.
        Parameters:
        patchScale - the scale of the patch compared to the patch extracted by the internal detector.
        size - minimum detection size.

        detector - the face detector.
